messages.content: વાઈટ વાઈટ ફ્લાઈ માટેની દવા
messages.en: Medication for white white fly
messages.standalone_question: What is the medicine for white fly?
messages.standalone_en: What is the medicine for white fly?

messages.content:
વાઈટ ફ્લાઈ માટેની દવા તરીકે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Imidacloprid** - 0.5 ml/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - 0.2-0.3 gm/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.

આ દવાઓને છંટકાવ કરવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય અને પદ્ધતિનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
As a medicine for whitefly, you can use the following medications:

1. **Imidacloprid** - Mix in 0.5 ml/liter water.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - Mix in water 0.2-0.3 gm/liter.

It is important to take care of the right time and method to spray these medicines.

messages.content: થ્રિપ્સ માટેની દવા
messages.en: Medication for thrips
messages.standalone_question: What are the recommended medications for thrips?
messages.standalone_en: What are the recommended medications for thrips?

faq:
Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

messages.content:
થ્રિપ્સ માટેની દવા તરીકે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Thiamethoxam** - 0.2-0.3 gm/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.
2. **Chlorpyrifos** - 5 ml/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.

આ દવાઓને છંટકાવ કરવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય અને પદ્ધતિનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
As a medicine for thrips, you can use the following medications:

1. **Thiamethoxam** - Mix in water 0.2-0.3 gm/liter.
2. **Chlorpyrifos** - Mix in 5 ml/liter water.

It is important to take care of the right time and method to spray these medicines.

messages.content: ગળો માટેની દવા
messages.en: Medication for the throat
messages.standalone_question: What medication is recommended for throat issues?
messages.standalone_en: What medication is recommended for throat issues?

messages.content:
ગળો (Alternaria) માટેની દવા તરીકે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Copper Oxychloride** - 2.5-3 gm/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.
2. **Mancozeb** - 2.5 gm/liter પાણીમાં ભેળવો.

આ દવાઓને છંટકાવ કરવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય અને પદ્ધતિનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.
messages.en:
As a medication for alternaria, you can use the following medications:

1. **Copper Oxychloride** - Mix in 2.5-3 gm/liter water.
2. **Mancozeb** - Mix in 2.5 gm/liter water.

It is important to take care of the right time and method to spray these medicines.

આ દવાઓને છંટકાવ કરવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય અને પદ્ધતિનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

It is important to take care of the right time and method to spray these medicines.

messages.content: आज कोणता स्प्रे घ्यावा
messages.en: What spray to take today
messages.standalone_question: What spray should I use today?
messages.standalone_en: What spray should I use today?

faq:
Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content:
आज "SSN plot" साठी तुम्हाला खालील स्प्रे घेण्याची शिफारस केली जाते:

1. **Flea beetle** साठी:
   - **Thiamethoxam**: 100 gm
   - किंवा
   - **Beta-cyfluthrin**: 200 ml

साथीला 400 लिटर पाण्यात मिसळा.
messages.en:
Today for the "SSN plot" you are recommended to take the following spray:

1. For Flea beetle:
   - Thiamethoxam: 100 gm
   - or
   - Beta-cyfluthrin: 200 ml

Mix the friend in 400 liters of water.

   - किंवा
2. **Beta-cyfluthrin**: 200 ml

साथीला 400 लिटर पाण्यात मिसळा.

Today you are recommended to take the following spray for the "SSN plot" to make a lot of noise:

1. Thiamethoxam: 100 gm
   - or
2. Beta-cyfluthrin: 200 ml

Mix the friend in 400 liters of water.

messages.content: भुरी लावणी
messages.en: Bhuri Lavani

messages.content:
भुरी लावणी म्हणजेच वेलवर्गीय पिकांची लागवड. तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये (Plot No.2) सध्या "गृपेस" पिकाची "सबकन" अवस्था आहे. भुरी लावणीसाठी योग्य काळ म्हणजे पिकाच्या वाढीच्या अवस्थेत असताना, जेव्हा पिकाची मुळे मजबूत असतात.

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये भुरी लावणीसाठी योग्य काळ म्हणजे पिकाच्या "फ्रूट प्रुनिंग" अवस्थेच्या आधी, म्हणजेच "फ्रूट प्रुनिंग" अवस्थेची सुरुवात 2025-06-01 पासून होईल. 

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
Brown planting is the cultivation of vine crops. Plot No.2 is currently in a "subcon" stage of the "grouse" crop. The right time to plant brown is when the crop is in the growth stage, when the roots of the crop are strong.

The right time to plant brown in your plot is before the "fruit pruning" stage of the crop, i.e. the start of the "fruit pruning" phase from 2025-06-01. 

Is there anything else you need to know?

messages.content: भुरी करता स्प्रे
messages.en: Brown spray
messages.standalone_question: What is the spray used for bhuri?
messages.standalone_en: What is the spray used for bhuri?

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी (Plot No.2) भुरीसाठी कोणतेही स्प्रे शेड्यूल नाही. त्यामुळे सध्या भुरीसाठी स्प्रे करण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
There is no spray schedule for your plot (Plot No.2). So there is no need to spray for brown at present. 

Do you need any more information?
Run 0:60:20 instead of 0:0:50
messages.standalone_question: Instead of 0:0:50, can it run at 0:60:20?
messages.standalone_en: Instead of 0:0:50, can it run at 0:60:20?

messages.content: મને માફ કરશો, પરંતુ હું કૃષિ સંબંધિત પ્રશ્નો અથવા કાર્યમાં મદદ કરી શકું છું. કૃપા કરીને કૃષિ સંબંધિત કોઈ પ્રશ્ન પૂછો.
messages.en: I'm sorry, but I can help with issues or work related to agriculture. Please ask any questions related to agriculture.
